revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD hAP |revision=lite (RB941-2nD-TC) |asin=B016E93MX2 |fcc_date=02/27/2015 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |availability=common |type=access point, wireless router |fcc_id=TV7RB941-2ND |ic_id=7442A-9412ND |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.7 |pwr_conn=Micro USB |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=650 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H561638N-LCCC |jtag=yes,, 10-pad header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS;Level 4; |tp_firmware=LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |oui=4C:5E:0C |oui_eth=4C:5E:0C }} {{TagLine|MikroTik hAP lite - Home Access Point}} :[http://routerboard.com/RB941-2nD-TC Product Page]
"48RNAAK3.5GA", "RouterBOARD 941 2nD" and "1435" :is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2542112 board]. 1.5dBi integrated Wi-Fi antennas {{see also|Wistron NeWeb|MikroTik}}
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=62480 ''RB941-2nD (hAP lite) support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://patchwork.ozlabs.org/patch/711136/ ''Patch accepted'' in '''LEDE Project''']
===Reviews=== *[http://weblance.com.ua/190-podrobnyy-obzor-mikrotik-hap-lite-rb941-2nd-luchshiy-domashniy-router-v-svoem-cenovom-segmente.html On '''WebLance'''] (RU)
===Images=== <gallery> File:hAPl.jpg|PCB </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]

FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB952-5AC2ND TV7RB952-5AC2ND] :Dual-Concurrent 2.4/5GHz AP, 802.11ac, 5x FE ports, 24V/1.2A, :POE-out on port 5, 1x USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, QCA9887, 16/64MB <!--(Flash Winbond (SPI)/RAM Nanya (DDR2))--> *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP ac lite tower (RB952Ui-5ac2nD-TC)]] :[https://routerboard.com/RB952Ui-5ac2nD-TC RB952Ui-5ac2nD-TC] ('''hAP ac lite tower''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB952-5AC2ND TV7RB952-5AC2ND] :Dual-Concurrent 2.4/5GHz AP, 802.11ac, 5x FE ports, 24V/1.2A, :POE-out on port 5, 1x USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 4C:5E:0C :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, QCA9887, 16/64MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP (RB951Ui-2nD)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB951Ui-2nD RB951Ui-2nD] ('''hAP''') - 2.4GHz AP - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RB951UI-2ND TV7RB951UI-2ND] :5x FE ports, POE-out on port 5, USB for 3G/4G support, OUI: 00:0C:42, :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, 16/64MB, 24V/0.8A <!--(Flash Winbond (SPI)/RAM Nanya (DDR2))--> *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hAP lite (RB941-2nD-TC)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB941-2nD-TC RB941-2nD-TC] ('''hAP lite''') -
